comments.html:
FWIW, I appreciate the tips you present, no matter the format. If it's blog-worthy, put it there. If it's more detailed and needs other input, use the wiki.

In either case, I'm hitting those sites. Most of the stuff you post is over my head (for now), but I very often do run across items to pass on to my colleagues.

Your blog is in my RSS reader and your wiki is bookmarked.

Thanks for all you do!
comments.name: Anonymous
